gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains the Coordinated Energy and Water Cycle Observation Project (CEOP) CEOP_AP 30 minute Flux Data Set. This data set contains averaged 30 minute data from three stations in the Tsukuba reference site. The MRI station covers 1 Jan 2007 through 30 Jun 2010, TERC-UT covers 1 Jan 2007 through 31 Dec 2009 and NIAES-MASE covers 1 Jan 2007 through 31 Dec 2008. This data set contains both ASCII data and netCDF data. The ASCII data file covers the entire time period for all stations. The netCDF data file covers the entire time period with one netCDF file for each station.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: NetCDF: Network Common Data Form for CEOP (application/x-netcdf)

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: EARTH SCIENCE > LAND SURFACE > SOILS > SOIL HEAT BUDGET

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: These data are restricted by a user agreement: https://data.eol.ucar.edu/file/download/4212F1064C63/ceop_policy.html

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: CEOP_AP Tsukuba Flux Data Data Order Form

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Dataset order request form. Data files are made available via HTTPS.
